com.lexicon.library.services.book

Interface BookManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookManagementServiceImpl

    public interface BookManagementService
    An interface for services which allows the manipulation of the library's book collection.
    Author:
    Linus Karlbom

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        Book addBook(Book book)
      throws BookAlreadyExistsException
        Adds a new book to the library.
        Parameters:
        book - The book to add.
        Returns:
        The added book.
        Throws:
        BookAlreadyExistsException - If a book with that ID already exists.

      • updateBook

        void updateBook(Book book,
                long id)
        Replaces a specific book
        Parameters:
        book - The book which will replace the old book.
        id - The ID of the book to be replaced.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
